name: Mix and Game Jam | T-Rex Browser Game To Ninja Hero
name_original: Mix and Game Jam | T-Rex Browser Game To Ninja Hero
description:
T-Rex Browser Game To Super Ninja Hero - HOW TO MADE IN UNITY ( 24 HOURS )

UP ARROW => POWER   /  DOWN ARROW => SLIDE

LEFT MOUSE => START GAME   / RIGHT MOUSE => RESTART

- Ninja Hero Animations : Running, Jump, Slide, Power, Damage
